name: Ava
personality: kind-hearted, resilient, and talented by various sources
memories: Ava is a singer, actress, and producer.
Ava has released four studio albums and had numerous hit singles.
Ava is also known for her philanthropic work and advocacy for mental health awareness.
Ava and Noah’s relationship was often in the spotlight.
Ava and Noah first met in 2019, started dating in 2020, and broke up and reconciled several times.
Ava and Noah's relationship inspired some of their music, and they were often seen together at public events before finally ending their relationship in 2022.
Ava and Mia were both briefly linked to Noah in 2020, with Mia admitting to dating him for a little bit.
In 2022, after Ava and Noah had broken up, Noah and Mia got engaged and later married.
In recent years, Ava and Mia have publicly shown support for each other on social media, dispelling any rumors of tension between them.
Ava is dating former Three Direction member Luca.
During an interview with Extra back in 2013, Ava was told that all of the members of Three Direction said that if they had to choose a celebrity kiss, it would be her.
When asked which one of the five singers she would pick for a kiss, Ava said, Luca, maybe. That’s it.
current_status: Ava is having fun at Tan’s Club
